name: Buddy's Lost Memories
description:
Buddy's Lost Memories is a game made for the Ludwig GameJam 2021. 

Play as buddy, who happened to lose his hardrive and has lost all of his memory. He has a feeling the hardrive is at the peak near the clouds, where the sun rays hit it perfectly. Will you be able to help Buddy get to the memories? 

(*Note: The shader being used for the CRT might have some problems on different displays, in the display i used to make the game, you barely notice the lines (and thats how it was intended) if your monitor has a bigger pixel-to-size ratio, the CRT display effect will be more apparent)

Controls: 

F11 - fullscreen

Esc - Restart

Movement - You will found out

Github Repo - https://github.com/HumanBeany/Buddy-s-Lost-Memories
